meanings.definition: Not lying in the same plane.
meanings.sent1: The two noncoplanar lines intersected at a point above the paper.
meanings.sent2: The architect designed a noncoplanar structure that stood out from the rest of the buildings.
meanings.sent3: The noncoplanar shapes on the wall made it look like a 3D puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were noncoplanar, floating freely in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a noncoplanar landscape that seemed to defy gravity.

meanings.sent1: The noncoplanar triangles formed a unique pattern on the geometric worksheet.
meanings.sent2: The noncoplanar points on the map indicated different elevations.
meanings.sent3: The noncoplanar surfaces of the table and chair made them fit together oddly.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like noncoplanar lines, always close but never quite parallel.
meanings.sent5: The noncoplanar shadows cast by the trees created a mesmerizing effect on the ground.
